metadata.title: CVE-2019-5882 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Irssi 1.1.x before 1.1.2 has a use after free when hidden lines are expiredfrom the scroll buffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5882` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.15-5ubuntu3.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.15-5ubuntu3.6').
